name: Special Delivery - Remake
description:
A retro remake of the Spectrum game Special Delivery by Creative Sparks Ltd. circa 1984.

Keys: Arrow keys and spacebar.

  1. Sleigh Game
    1. Collect the presents as they drop.
    2. Avoid clouds and trees, they will cause you to drop presents.
    3. If you get struck by lightning from storm clouds, you'll lose an hour.
    4. When you reach the end of the trees...
      1. if you have enough presents, indicated by the 'count/required' indicator, you will have the chance to land on a house to take the presents to the children in side. Land by flying down to the lowest height and come to a stop over the house. You will then enter the Chimney Game
      2. If you don't have enough presents, you can launch those you do, with space bar, into the smaller houses for points
  2. Chimney Game
    1. Move down the chimney on the ladders provided. Avoid the fire coming up the chimney by stepping side to side between the three ladders. You can go up a little way to avoid fire if necessary.
    2. If you get burned, you'll lose an hour and Santa will jump up to the top of the chimney and return you to the sleigh game to try again.
    3. If you reach the bottom without getting burned, you will then enter the House Game.
  3. House Game.
    1. Navigate the house using the (not yet visible) stairs, place the presents under the tree, collect the key and exit the house through the front door.
    2. Avoid the sleepwalking kids, don't want to spoil the magic of Christmas.
